original_text: King David said to him, ‘Come with me to live in Jerusalem. I will take care of you while you are with me there.’
korean_text: 왕이 바르실래에게 이르되 너는 나와 함께 건너가자 예루살렘에서 내가 너를 공궤하리라

sentences.original_text: 'Come with me to live in Jerusalem
I will take care of you
while you are with me there'
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 나와 함께 그곳에 있는 동안'
